name: concopy
description: Firefox extension to copy web content with custom JavaScript functions

scripts.build: vite build && npm run postbuild && npm run package
scripts.postbuild: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/icons dist/ && cp -r gallery dist/
scripts.package: cd dist && zip -r ../concopy-extension.zip . --exclude '*.DS_Store' && cd .. && echo 'Extension packaged as concopy-extension.zip'
scripts.package:firefox: npm run build && echo 'Firefox extension ready for installation at concopy-extension.zip'
